song_lyrics: Santo vachandrohīno dhaṇī nahi, ghaṇu rahe gunegār re;
Santo jyā jyā jāye tyā jan maḷī, vaḷī kare tiraskār re... Santo° 1
Santo lesh vachan jo lopīe, ati thaī unmatta re;
Santo ek ekaḍo jem ṭāḷtā, khoṭu thaī jāy khat re... Santo° 2
Koī so so kanyā paraṇāve sutne, pachhī mare moṭiyār re;
Santo rānḍyā vinā emā koṇ rahe, rānḍe sau ek hār re... Santo° 3
Em vachan vinā ā vishvamā, varate chhe je vimukh re;
Kahe Niṣhkuḷānand tene nīrakhatā, sant na māne sukh re... Santo° 4
title: Santo vachandrohīno dhaṇī nahi

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-492: Sadguru Nishkulanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
